Camp Events

Mirage Garage is pleased to finally announce its 2019 event schedule! Please find all evenst below. We encourage all campers in our welcome packet to hand out Party Flyers to beg people to come to our events so they don't look like total ghost towns - participation is key to being in good standing!

Day/Time Name Description
Monday, 10AM-12AM Pimp Your Kimono Here at Mirage Garage two things that we prioritize is feeling and looking good, and there's no better way to achieve both than rocking a bangin' Kimono! Bring your Kimono or get one here produced by our in-house master seamstress and pimp it out. Prizes will be given for the most decked out Kimono, as judged by Xzibit himself!
Tuesday, all day Sherpa Hunting Filling an entire corner of a plaza is no easy feat, and it takes a lot of manpower to put it all together. It's tough to recruit people for no pay to labor in the hot sun with no facilities the week before early entry, so here at the Garage we tell them they can camp with us all week as bait. However, we pull the ol' switcheroo and then kick them out right as they finish. This is a tried and true technique us New Yorkers learned from the great New York legend Trump himself! This leaves us in the position where we need to find new Sherpas to tear everything down, and that's where you come in! Whoever can bag the most Sherpas will receive a golden net and trident.
Wednesday, 8PM-12PM Motor Oil Cocktail Hour Continuing with the theme of cars and garages, Mirage Garage is pleased to open up the camp bar to everyone for our Motor Oil Cocktail Hour. However, there is a twist... all the drinks contain real motor oil! Disposing of leaking oil on Playa is quite tricky, so we like to slip some into every drink so that we don't have to deal with getting rid of it. Heaven forbid we get another giant red mark on the Moop Map!
Thursday, 2PM-4PM Justify that Headdress Assistance Everyone and their mother knows that you shouldn't wear a headdress on Playa, although everyone acknowledges how awesome they are. The general exception to this is that you can wear one if you can claim direct heritage. We're pleased to partner with Ancestry.com and 23andMe to find the most distant connection to you and someone in the distant past that was once able to wear a headdress. You might be a few dozen or hundred ancestors away, but we're confident in our ability to find or fudge that link!
Friday, 1PM-3PM Psychottherapy sessions Exploiting the lower classes, being relentlessly ruthless in your day to day interactions, and generally engaging in cutthroat capitalist activities really beats down on you mentally. That's why we had a licensed professional psychotherapist on site to help your justify your terrible behavior! Let that guilt go away so you can put that next business ploy in play. With the doctor in, there's no way you're not going to win!

The Camp

At Mirage Garage, you're more than just a plug and play sparklepony, you're family. See what camping at Mirage Garage has to offer!

Sweet-Ass Art Cars

Need a way to get to deep Playa for your Instagram shoot but you've been slacking on Cardio day at Equinox and don't have the stamina? Mirage Garage is pleased to offer several stainless steel art cars for your convenience, which we affectionately refer to as the "Garbage Barge". As a bonus, one is always positioned in front of camp, so you don't even have to leave camp to get the shot! Cars are left unlocked in the event you need to get to deep Playa and the chauffeur is not at camp.

A 30,000 Dollar Shower

Mingle with the peasants and feel the need to wash the commoner stink away?. Our shower is the perfect amenity to do so. It is guaranteed to be stocked with the freshest product, comes with an unlimited supply of Lush products, and can get hotter than an old time Burner when they get angry watching the RVs pour in! Pay no attention to the Sherpa passed out behind the shower exhausted from setting it up.

Daily Cookies

Nothing brings camp together more than bonding over delicious food, and at Mirage Garage we have fresh baked cookies every afternoon. Our celebrity campers and supermodels will even pretend to cook them for you! Gluten free options are of course available, although note that the recipe used is NOT sourced from the Goop cookbook.

Campsite Options

At Mirage Garage, we're strong believers in that one size doesn't fit all. We have many campsite offerings depending on your needs, your wealth , and how shamelessly you want to display it.

About

Mirage Garage wasn't built overnight (although our Sherpas try their hardest!). It definitely wouldn't happen without the involvement and efforts of a few key individuals working together to create something greater than themselves or their trust funds. Here's a timeline from inception to what you see today.

  • 2010-2011

    Our Humble Beginnings

    The founders of the camp, tired and jaded from attending Coachella and Ultra year after year, began to search for something new. Instagram, created recently in 2010, had a trending hashtag of "#burningman", and one of the founders happened to see it in their feed after subscribing to the "#festival" tag. The founders were intrigued, and after talking to some folks they met at their Coachella Safari Campsite, they began their research in earnest.

  • March 2011

    A Camp is Born

    Realizing that they could get ahead of the festival and turn-key experience turn, the founders began to seriously plot what kind of camp they wanted to build. It needed to be more luxurious, exclusive, and trendy than the other neighboring, competing camps, so they enlisted the help of wealthy benefactors to turn their dreams into reality. They realized that building such a camp wasn't going to be cheap, and that bribing the Org to turn the other way wasn't free either, and had to reset expectations to bring their dream to the Playa for the following year.

  • August 2012

    The Camp Lives

    After nearly a year of planning and schmoozing the right people, Mirage Garage finally made it to the Playa. Featuring only forty air-conditioned tents, a Michelin star rated chef, and only one masseuse for the campers, the group toughed it out in the rugged conditions, and barely made it through. Things were so unprepared that two campers had to share the same costume box! The organizers vowed to never put their campers through such hardships again, and began to plan anew.

  • August 2018

    The Camp Today

    Fast forward a few years and one wouldn't recognize the Mirage Garage that came to Playa in 2012 vs the complex that dominates the 6&I plaza. With multiple art cars, public air conditioned spaces, an exhibition tent, an onsite photographer, public Wi-fi, and an army of hosts ready to cater to every campers needs, Mirage Garage stepped up its game to become THE destination on the Playa. There was even an event hosted on site that made it to the WWW!

  • July 2019

    The Trek to New Territory

    With the Burning Man 10 year environmental sustainability recently released, Mirage Garage realized they needed to move away from their beloved plot on the 6&I Plaza to a new plaza. The southeast corner of that particular plaza was deemed to be less habitable for humans than usual after the Moop sweepers marked the entire area as red. Although the campers are sad to leave what they call home, it also means the beginning of a new journey, and since there's always room for more campers, that leads to the next phase of our story...

  • Be Part
    Of Our
    Camp!

Camp Testimonials

My favorite thing about Mirage Garage is the diversity. Between all the beautiful head dresses walking around, the Day of the Dead face paint workshop, and pimp your Kimono sessions I just can't help but feel like I'm in this giant melting pot of beautiful people from all corners of the country. It feels like I grabbed the J train all the way from Greenwich Village to Queens and made a stop at every station! - Jonathan, Investment Banker, MAGA 2020

I've found that there's few other places on Earth that inspire me the same way that Mirage Garage does. Usually come August or Q4 I'm really stretching to come up with inspirational content for my Linkedin feed, but man oh man a day or two with the beautiful people at Mirage Garage really allows me to tap into the deepest parts of my soul to come up with amazing content. With camp internet access, I can post inspiring articles every day on my feed and my blog! Be sure to connect on Linkedin and follow my Medium.com page! - Sandra, Fitness Instructor and Motivational Speaker. Almost gave a TedX talk in 2018.

Look, I'll cut straight to the chase with you, I camp with the Garage because there's a ton of beautiful bitches. Don't get me wrong, I have no shortage of that back home, but did you see the rack on that skank pouring drinks by the Smirnoff Fridge? Holy shit, am I right? Haha yeah give me a bump on that one. Oh... nah fist bumps are cool, but I was talking about that Ketamine. - Chad, Los Angeles, Event Planner

Let me put it this way: if we didn't have the Valyrian Steel (omg btw AMAZING NAME I love Game of Thrones LOL!) art car to help us get out of the slums and in front of the Temple my makeup would have looked like shit by the time we would have been ready for the shoot had we walked or used the electric bikes. Gendry and his wrench monkeys go the distance to ensure that we look our best when getting the shot, and they even went above and beyond this past year by forcibly moving those grieving losers out of the way! - Arianna, Social Media Influencer, Aspiring Model, Verified Instagram Account Holder

Contact Us

Contact Us to become a camper today! Our Campers come from across the globe, and whatever your background is or wherever you're from you'll soon identify Mirage Garage as home. Packages start at only $10,000 and go all the way up to whatever you're willing to pay to be one of the cool kids! Whatever your budget is, we'll have something that you're guaranteed to enjoy, or at least stay at during your rave, photoshoot, or Silicon Valley Networking event!

Basic Economy

Some of our campers just want to Burn with a nice feather mattress and hot shower to return to at the end of the day, and some just want to rage and get ratchet the entire time. This option is perfect for those that are planning on spending no time at camp and all of their time in front of the sound camps in a state of mind altered (high on life, of course!) bliss in an attempt to hit every DJ with an active Soundcloud playing and only need something portable to sustain them. The Mirage Garage branded backpack supplied is packed full of every stimulant and condensed food option you would need to last three days on the Playa without returning to base. We consulted with the top scientists at NASA to ensure that we didn't miss anything that you could need. Sunrise is coming up and you're miles away from a cup of coffee? No problem, sprinkle some of that pure caffeine powder into your Mirage Garage branded water bottle! Muscle tension from dancing all night and you haven't had the opportunity to stretch or rub one out in the portashitter yet? Nothing that our included packet of the most culturally appropriated Yoga stretches that we hand selected can't get you out of! Additional provisions can be purchased to refill the backpack onsite for varying fees, although note that purchasing an additional bag is prohibited as only one personal item is allowed.

  • Offered At: $10,000

It Takes Fyre To Burn

It's been a rough year for some of our campers at other festivals. Some had to walk nearly two miles to see Kayne play at Coachella this past year, some had to get their own rides from the BRC Airport because the Pit Crew was too busy to pick them up, and some had to endure a less than a stellar experience at the Fyre Festival. Well have no fear! For those that were unlucky enough to NOT get a tent at Fyre this past year and had to rough it out on the beach with a bunch of sunburnt bros Mirage Garage is pleased to offer the FEMA tents that you missed out on! These tents were battle tested by attendees last year, and anyone that managed to secure one can attest to their luxury. Some of these are quite famous, having been featured in several documentaries. Each tent comes with a sopping wet mattress, which is quite the feat once you consider you're in the middle of a desert! Unfortunately, Ja Rule won't be onsite to escort you to your tent this time, but we did manage to find P-Diddy at the airport as a substitute.

  • Offered At: $20,000

I Scream, You Scream, We All Scream for Airstream

Any commoner can rent a RV through Share My Coach and drag it out to the Playa, but a true connoisseur of the Playa knows that the way to go is with an Airstream. Here at the Garage, we're a sucker for anything that sort of fits in to the car or stainless steel theme, so we're pleased to offer an Airstream as an option. This bad boy gets polished each day by the Pit Crew so that it always looks fresh and more shiny than the pure silver plates that we use to serve our camp meals on (on which you'll be forced to serve at least one, so that we can claim that we're 100% participatory!). Various vintage Airstreams are available, so accommodations will vary depending on what year you find acceptable.

  • Offered At: $80,000

Fatana Morgana

What's that at the edge of the Playa shimmering in the distance.... is it an Oasis? Is it a naked old dude on a bike? Is it a dirty wook berating someone for not sharing water with them because they don't know that the Playa Provides? Or is it actually your luxurious housing for your time at the Burn? This room pays tribute to the great Mirage that our camp is partially named after. This room is so swanky that you'd be right in thinking that it is indeed a mirage. The BOrg apparently has also mistaken the entire complex for a mirage and convinced themselves that it doesn't exist, which is why it probably hasn't been shut down yet! This room comes with a hot tub with sand at the bottom for that authentic Desert Oasis experience, as well as palm trees providing shade.

  • Offered At: $100,000

2066 Crist Drive

Here at Mirage Garage, we like to pay tribute to the various garages around the world that have been the homes of the businesses that have netted us millions in stock. Our favorite garage of course is 2066 Crist Drive, home to the legendary business who managed to convince the world that buying an over-priced mass produced by exploited slave labor item made you a forward thinking creative genius. This campsite is modeled after that garage, although this one contains a King sized bed, a mini-bar, air conditioning, and a ten foot portrait of the great Jobs himself thinking different over the bed. Note that this unit does NOT have a medicine cabinet in it, although it comes with an unlimited supply of fruit smoothies.

  • Offered At: $150,000

Let the Goodell Times Roll

Mirage Garage wouldn't happen without a lot of people. The Sherpas, the Pit Crew, the Bike Czar, and the personal chefs are all important, but none of it would happen without the big shots at the Burning Man Organization. Without their blessing, this camp wouldn't exist in the first place! Camping here directly helps our biggest supporter and backer, and its what allows us to come to the Burn year after year without repercussion. This 18 Wheeler is packed full of amenities. A gold-plated shower, a fully stocked mini-bar and regular sized bar, a king sized bed with a mattress full of feathers handpicked from around the world, your own dedicated concierge, a sauna and hot tub, air conditioning, and a personal art car awaits you in this luxurious living space.

  • Offered At: $261,000
